data.name: Finding Ice
data.detailed_description:
Embark upon a unique and tear-jerking journey about an Arctic Wolf and his mission to discover his past in the face of climate change. Explore the vast wilderness that surrounds the East Falls, uncovering clues as to what happened in his past life.

Set in the imaginary East Falls Mountains, Finding Ice takes the player on a one-of-a-kind experience to discover how manmade climate change has devastated the once sprawling and stunning landscape.

The player must re-connect with nature in order to progress to the next phase of this story game, they must complete puzzles and collect items in order to progress to the next phase of this beautiful story.

Uncover a seemingly untouched world through a third-person Arctic Wolf:



Explore the East Falls in the different seasons, Summer, Autumn and Winter.

Discover clues of a past long-forgotten:

data.short_description: In this one-of-a-kind story game, the player must explore vast worlds through a third-person Arctic Wolf, complete puzzles, collect items and re-connect with nature.
data.legal_notice: All music and fonts in the trailer above are licenced by DanstaStudios and valid due to the fact that the end product was the trailer.
